name: KMyMoney Data File
summary: Learn about .KMY files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: KMY files are XML files compressed with Gzip (.GZ) compression. Therefore, you can view the XML data manually by renaming the ".kmy" extension to "xml.gz," decompressing with Gzip, and then opening with any XML or text editor.
NOTE: KMyMoney can also be used on Windows with by first installig the KDE Platform, or on Mac OS X by using MacPorts.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
